label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"鸡副伤寒","labels":["disease"]},{"start":6,"end":10,"text":"沙门氏菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":33,"end":38,"text":"慢性传染病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":25,"end":27,"text":"幼鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":30,"end":32,"text":"急性","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 鸡副伤寒是由沙门氏菌属中的一些细菌引起的，主要侵害幼鸡的一种急性或慢性传染病。

label: [{"start":10,"end":12,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":30,"end":33,"text":"病原菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":49,"end":52,"text":"消化道","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":26,"end":28,"text":"粪便","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: (一)流行病学特征：病鸡和其他带菌动物是传染来源，经粪便排出病原菌，污染饲料、饮水、用具和环境，经消化道感染。

label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"鸡副伤寒","labels":["disease"]},{"start":14,"end":17,"text":"带病菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":22,"end":25,"text":"呼吸道","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":28,"end":32,"text":"鸡副伤寒","labels":["disease"]},{"start":34,"end":41,"text":"人和畜禽共患病","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 鸡副伤寒也可经种蛋垂直传播；带病菌的飞沫可经呼吸道传播。鸡副伤寒属于人和畜禽共患病。

label: [{"start":6,"end":8,"text":"禽类","labels":["type"]}]
text: 人和畜或其他禽类都能相互传染，鼠类、苍蝇也能成为传递因素。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 雏鸡最易感，常暴发流行。

label: [{"start":41,"end":45,"text":"鸡副伤寒","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 鸡场饲养管理：不善，环境卫生差，如温度忽高忽低，拥挤，空气污秽，营养不足等均可促进鸡副伤寒发生。

label: [{"start":12,"end":14,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":16,"end":21,"text":"急性败血症","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: (二)临床症状4～5日龄雏鸡多呈急性败血症经过，有时不见症状而死亡。

label: [{"start":6,"end":8,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":15,"end":19,"text":"精神不振","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":20,"end":22,"text":"低头","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":23,"end":25,"text":"缩颈","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":26,"end":28,"text":"垂翅","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":29,"end":31,"text":"怕冷","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":32,"end":36,"text":"拥挤成堆","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":37,"end":41,"text":"食欲降低","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":45,"end":49,"text":"渴欲增加","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":50,"end":57,"text":"羽毛松乱无光泽","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":52,"end":57,"text":"松乱无光泽","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":58,"end":60,"text":"下痢","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":61,"end":66,"text":"排水样粪便","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":67,"end":75,"text":"污染肛门周围羽毛","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":21,"end":22,"text":"头","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":24,"end":25,"text":"颈","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":27,"end":28,"text":"翅","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":50,"end":52,"text":"羽毛","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":64,"end":66,"text":"粪便","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":69,"end":75,"text":"肛门周围羽毛","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 10日龄以上雏鸡症状明显，表现精神不振，低头、缩颈、垂翅、怕冷、拥挤成堆，食欲降低或废绝、渴欲增加、羽毛松乱无光泽、下痢、排水样粪便，污染肛门周围羽毛；

label: [{"start":4,"end":8,"text":"眼结膜炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":9,"end":11,"text":"流泪","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":16,"end":20,"text":"呼吸困难","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":21,"end":23,"text":"病雏","labels":["type"]}]
text: 有时表现眼结膜炎、流泪；有时可见呼吸困难。病雏多于1～2天死亡。

label: [{"start":0,"end":3,"text":"结膜炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":4,"end":6,"text":"鼻炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":7,"end":9,"text":"肠炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":10,"end":12,"text":"下痢","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":13,"end":23,"text":"肛门周围羽毛粘有粪便","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":13,"end":19,"text":"肛门周围羽毛","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":21,"end":23,"text":"粪便","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 结膜炎、鼻炎、肠炎、下痢，肛门周围羽毛粘有粪便等仍然存在。

label: [{"start":0,"end":3,"text":"成年鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":5,"end":7,"text":"隐性","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":8,"end":10,"text":"慢性","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":31,"end":33,"text":"消瘦","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":34,"end":36,"text":"下痢","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":37,"end":40,"text":"结膜炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":41,"end":46,"text":"产蛋率下降","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":47,"end":54,"text":"种蛋孵化率降低","labels":["symptom"]}]
text: 成年鸡常呈隐性或慢性经过，是危险的带菌者，症状轻微，庄要症状是消瘦，下痢，结膜炎，产蛋率下降，种蛋孵化率降低。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"急性","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":31,"end":35,"text":"回肠充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":33,"end":35,"text":"充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":36,"end":41,"text":"出血性炎症","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":42,"end":46,"text":"肠壁增厚","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":44,"end":46,"text":"增厚","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":47,"end":54,"text":"肠淋巴滤泡肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":52,"end":54,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":23,"end":27,"text":"十二指肠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":28,"end":30,"text":"空肠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":31,"end":33,"text":"回肠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":42,"end":44,"text":"肠壁","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":47,"end":52,"text":"肠淋巴滤泡","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 急性死亡者病理变化不明显。发病过程稍缓和的可见十二指肠、空肠、回肠充血，出血性炎症，肠壁增厚，肠淋巴滤泡肿大；

label: [{"start":0,"end":3,"text":"肝肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":1,"end":3,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":4,"end":6,"text":"充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":7,"end":12,"text":"出血性条纹","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":22,"end":25,"text":"灰白色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":30,"end":34,"text":"脾脏肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":32,"end":34,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":22,"end":29,"text":"灰白色坏死小点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":0,"end":1,"text":"肝","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":30,"end":32,"text":"脾脏","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 肝肿大、充血和出血性条纹，并有针尖大至粟粒大灰白色坏死小点；脾脏肿大；

label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"胆囊肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":2,"end":4,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":5,"end":9,"text":"充满胆汁","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":14,"end":23,"text":"心包膜和心外膜粘连","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":21,"end":23,"text":"粘连","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":24,"end":29,"text":"心包液增多","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":27,"end":29,"text":"增多","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":10,"end":13,"text":"心包炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"胆囊","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":14,"end":17,"text":"心包膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":18,"end":21,"text":"心外膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":24,"end":26,"text":"心包","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 胆囊肿大并充满胆汁；心包炎，心包膜和心外膜粘连，心包液增多；

label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"肾脏充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":2,"end":4,"text":"充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":5,"end":7,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":11,"end":15,"text":"肺炎病灶","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"肾脏","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 肾脏充血，肿大；有的见肺炎病灶。

label: [{"start":0,"end":3,"text":"成年鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":6,"end":8,"text":"消瘦","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":9,"end":11,"text":"肠炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":12,"end":19,"text":"肠黏膜坏死溃疡","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":15,"end":19,"text":"坏死溃疡","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":20,"end":24,"text":"腹腔积水","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":22,"end":24,"text":"积水","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":25,"end":29,"text":"输卵管炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":30,"end":33,"text":"卵巢炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":38,"end":42,"text":"肾脏肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":40,"end":42,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":43,"end":52,"text":"心肌有坏死性小结节","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":46,"end":52,"text":"坏死性小结节","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":57,"end":60,"text":"关节炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":12,"end":15,"text":"肠黏膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":20,"end":22,"text":"腹腔","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":34,"end":35,"text":"肝","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":36,"end":37,"text":"脾","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":38,"end":40,"text":"肾脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":43,"end":45,"text":"心肌","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 成年鸡表现为消瘦，肠炎，肠黏膜坏死溃疡，腹腔积水，输卵管炎，卵巢炎，肝、脾、肾脏肿大，心肌有坏死性小结节，有时可见关节炎。

label: [{"start":7,"end":16,"text":"加强种鸡场卫生管理","labels":["control"]},{"start":18,"end":20,"text":"种鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 二、防制措施：加强种鸡场卫生管理，使种鸡健康；

label: [{"start":6,"end":10,"text":"彻底消毒","labels":["control"]},{"start":23,"end":27,"text":"保持清洁","labels":["control"]}]
text: 种蛋入孵前要彻底消毒；孵化室、孵化器、出雏器要保持清洁；

label: [{"start":5,"end":7,"text":"野禽","labels":["type"]},{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"防止鼠类","labels":["control"]}]
text: 防止鼠类、野禽和闲杂人员入舍；

label: [{"start":0,"end":12,"text":"加强育雏期饲养与卫生管理","labels":["control"]},{"start":13,"end":19,"text":"饲料营养全价","labels":["control"]},{"start":23,"end":27,"text":"湿度适宜","labels":["control"]},{"start":28,"end":32,"text":"空气新鲜","labels":["control"]},{"start":33,"end":38,"text":"环境卫生好","labels":["control"]},{"start":39,"end":47,"text":"合理使用预防药物","labels":["control"]}]
text: 加强育雏期饲养与卫生管理，饲料营养全价，温度、湿度适宜，空气新鲜，环境卫生好，合理使用预防药物；

label: [{"start":5,"end":9,"text":"及时治疗","labels":["control"]},{"start":26,"end":30,"text":"拌料喂服","labels":["control"]},{"start":10,"end":13,"text":"金霉素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":14,"end":17,"text":"土霉素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":18,"end":21,"text":"四环素","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 发现病情要及时治疗，金霉素、土霉素或四环素按0.4%拌料喂服，疗效较好。

label: [{"start":7,"end":15,"text":"适当增加拌料浓度","labels":["control"]}]
text: 如食欲不振，可适当增加拌料浓度。

label: [{"start":0,"end":5,"text":"氨苄青霉素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":9,"end":11,"text":"口服","labels":["control"]}]
text: 氨苄青霉素每只每天口服500国际单位，连用3天，也很理想。

label: [{"start":8,"end":12,"text":"肌内注射","labels":["control"]},{"start":12,"end":15,"text":"链霉素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":16,"end":20,"text":"卡那霉素","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 如喂服不行，则可肌内注射链霉素或卡那霉素每只每次2毫克，每天2次，连用3天。

label: [{"start":0,"end":7,"text":"鸡副伤寒病原体","labels":["disease"]},{"start":19,"end":22,"text":"病原菌","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 鸡副伤寒病原体是人类细菌性食物中毒常见病原菌之一。

label: [{"start":3,"end":7,"text":"鸡副伤寒","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 因此，鸡副伤寒肉尸和蛋要无害化处理后，小心食用。

label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"鸡副伤寒","labels":["disease"]},{"start":6,"end":10,"text":"沙门氏菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":15,"end":17,"text":"下痢","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":18,"end":21,"text":"结膜炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":22,"end":24,"text":"消瘦","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":42,"end":44,"text":"慢性","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":45,"end":49,"text":"隐性感染","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":32,"end":34,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":37,"end":40,"text":"成年鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 鸡副伤寒是由沙门氏菌引起的，以下痢、结膜炎、消瘦为特征的传染病。雏鸡多发，成年鸡则为慢性或隐性感染。

label: [{"start":0,"end":3,"text":"病原菌","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 病原菌有多种病原型，广泛存在于哺乳动物、鸟类甚至爬行类动物体内或外界环境中，引起多种动物交互感染，也能感染人。

label: [{"start":3,"end":7,"text":"鸡副伤寒","labels":["disease"]},{"start":63,"end":66,"text":"消化道","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 因此，鸡副伤寒原除给养禽业造成直接经济损失外，还在公共卫生方面具有特别意义。被污染的饲料、饮水、场地、用具等是重要传染媒介，经消化道传染，也可经带菌蛋传染。

label: [{"start":0,"end":1,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":13,"end":15,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":52,"end":54,"text":"家禽","labels":["type"]},{"start":70,"end":72,"text":"成禽","labels":["type"]}]
text: 鸡感染呈散发或地方性流行，雏鸡在2周龄内感染发病，6~10天为高峰，发病率为10%～80%;1月龄以上的家禽有较强的抵抗力，一般不引起死亡；成禽不表现临床症状。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"幼禽","labels":["type"]},{"start":15,"end":17,"text":"幼禽","labels":["type"]},{"start":3,"end":5,"text":"急性","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":19,"end":23,"text":"败血症状","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 幼禽呈急性经过，经孵化器感染的幼禽，呈败血症状，不表现症状就迅速死亡。

label: [{"start":2,"end":4,"text":"病雏","labels":["type"]},{"start":12,"end":13,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":5,"end":8,"text":"排泄物","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 这些病雏的排泄物使同群的鸡感染，多于10~12日龄发病，死亡高峰在10～21日龄。

label: [{"start":6,"end":8,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":14,"end":17,"text":"无食欲","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":18,"end":24,"text":"离群独自站立","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":25,"end":27,"text":"怕冷","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":39,"end":41,"text":"下痢","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":42,"end":48,"text":"排出水样稀粪","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":53,"end":55,"text":"眼炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":56,"end":58,"text":"失明","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":47,"end":48,"text":"粪","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 10天以上的雏鸡发病的症状为无食欲，离群独自站立，怕冷，喜欢拥挤在温暖的地方，下痢、排出水样稀粪，有的发生眼炎、失明。

label: [{"start":0,"end":3,"text":"成年鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":6,"end":10,"text":"轻度腹泻","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":11,"end":13,"text":"消瘦","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":14,"end":18,"text":"产蛋减少","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 成年鸡有时有轻度腹泻、消瘦、产蛋减少。

label: [{"start":9,"end":14,"text":"肾瘀血肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":10,"end":14,"text":"瘀血肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":15,"end":31,"text":"肝脏表面有出血条纹和灰白色坏死点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":25,"end":28,"text":"灰白色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":20,"end":24,"text":"出血条纹","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":28,"end":31,"text":"坏死点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":32,"end":36,"text":"胆囊扩张","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":34,"end":36,"text":"扩张","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":37,"end":41,"text":"充满胆汁","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":5,"end":6,"text":"肝","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":7,"end":8,"text":"脾","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":9,"end":10,"text":"肾","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":15,"end":17,"text":"肝脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":32,"end":34,"text":"胆囊","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 病程较长的肝、脾、肾瘀血肿大，肝脏表面有出血条纹和灰白色坏死点，胆囊扩张，充满胆汁。

label: [{"start":2,"end":5,"text":"心包炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":6,"end":14,"text":"心包液增多呈黄色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":12,"end":14,"text":"黄色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":9,"end":11,"text":"增多","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":27,"end":32,"text":"出血性炎症","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":39,"end":49,"text":"干酪样黄色物质堵塞。","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":42,"end":44,"text":"黄色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":6,"end":8,"text":"心包","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":15,"end":17,"text":"小肠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":21,"end":25,"text":"十二指肠","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":33,"end":35,"text":"肠腔","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 常有心包炎，心包液增多呈黄色，小肠(尤其是十二指肠)有出血性炎症，肠腔中有时有干酪样黄色物质堵塞。

label: [{"start":6,"end":8,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":17,"end":20,"text":"成年鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":22,"end":24,"text":"慢性","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":25,"end":29,"text":"隐性传染","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 根据流行病学雏鸡发病率及死亡率高，成年鸡则为慢性或隐性传染；

label: [{"start":6,"end":8,"text":"下痢","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":9,"end":12,"text":"结膜炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":13,"end":15,"text":"消瘦","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":26,"end":29,"text":"肾肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":27,"end":29,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":35,"end":39,"text":"出血条纹","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":40,"end":46,"text":"灰白色坏死点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":40,"end":43,"text":"灰白色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":30,"end":46,"text":"肝脏表面有出血条纹和灰白色坏死点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":26,"end":27,"text":"肾","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":24,"end":25,"text":"脾","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":22,"end":23,"text":"肝","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":30,"end":32,"text":"肝脏","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 临床症状出现下痢、结膜炎、消瘦；病理变化可见肝、脾、肾肿大，肝脏表面有出血条纹和灰白色坏死点等进行诊断。

label: [{"start":8,"end":14,"text":"复方泰乐菌素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":16,"end":23,"text":"酒石酸泰乐菌素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":24,"end":30,"text":"硫氰酸红霉素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":31,"end":35,"text":"呋吗唑酮","labels":["drug"]},{"start":36,"end":40,"text":"VADE","labels":["drug"]},{"start":42,"end":46,"text":"利高霉素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":47,"end":53,"text":"呼拉杀星溶液","labels":["drug"]},{"start":54,"end":57,"text":"禽康乐","labels":["drug"]},{"start":62,"end":66,"text":"卡那霉素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":67,"end":70,"text":"增效剂","labels":["drug"]},{"start":77,"end":80,"text":"禽宝丹","labels":["drug"]},{"start":71,"end":75,"text":"红霉素粉","labels":["drug"]},{"start":81,"end":85,"text":"环丙沙星","labels":["drug"]},{"start":86,"end":90,"text":"恩诺沙星","labels":["drug"]},{"start":91,"end":95,"text":"氧氟沙星","labels":["drug"]},{"start":96,"end":99,"text":"磺胺类","labels":["drug"]}]
text: (1)治疗药物。复方泰乐菌素(含酒石酸泰乐菌素、硫氰酸红霉素、呋吗唑酮、VADE)、利高霉素、呼拉杀星溶液、禽康乐100(含卡那霉素、增效剂、红霉素粉)、禽宝丹、环丙沙星、恩诺沙星、氧氟沙星、磺胺类等药物都有较好疗效。

label: [{"start":16,"end":22,"text":"注意病禽隔离","labels":["control"]},{"start":23,"end":29,"text":"加强消毒工作","labels":["control"]},{"start":65,"end":71,"text":"严格消毒管理","labels":["control"]},{"start":18,"end":20,"text":"病禽","labels":["type"]},{"start":48,"end":50,"text":"种鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":37,"end":41,"text":"沙门氏菌","labels":["disease"]}]
text: (2)预防。采用综合预防措施，应注意病禽隔离和加强消毒工作。主要是针对感染沙门氏菌的主要途径，即种鸡、种蛋、孵化场、鸡场和饲料进行严格消毒管理。
